text_block_list.text:
I was having a leisurely walk, unencumbered, 
when I passed by the student dormitories ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Gyaaaaaaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaah! I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorrysorrysorry～～!

The sounds of screams and an apologetic Matikanefukukitaru 
echoed from the Ritto dormitory.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Haah… haah… Is there any kind person who could lend a hand…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! Fortunate timing! 
Truth be told, I find myself in a bit of a major pickle…
choice_data_list: I'm sure it's something absurd again…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: W-W-Wait, don't go! I beg for your sympathy～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Our fates are entwined, are they not, Trainer!? 
My preordained one, guided to me by Divine Shiraoki! 
Come, come, follow me, this way!
Fated, predetermined, forced, I was led to a room in the dorms.

I looked around to see garbage stacked from floor to ceiling. 
The scream I had heard earlier turned out to be her roommate's 
encounter with a rogue element of this massive pile.
choice_data_list: Does this trash heap have a name…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It is not trash～! This, this is my collection of lucky items. 
And a very majestic one at that, if I may say! I spent half 
my life gathering it all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Every single item is rare and important. I found myself unable 
to part with them, slowly accumulating this pile of treasures, 
until, eventually, it came crashing down on my friend here…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If left to grow further, the whole of Tracen Academy 
shall one day be swallowed by these many treasures! 
Ah, this isn't a prophecy, just my prediction.
choice_data_list: Let's just throw it all out…
Let's just throw it all out…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Heh? Gyaaaaaaah! Who would utter these cursed words with such nonchalance!? Throw it all out!? I wouldn't think of it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Did you hear me when I said they were my lucky items? 
I've made it this far thanks to their glorious blessings! 
And you intent to throw them all out?!
choice_data_list: <size=34>This giant pile looks more dangerous than lucky.</size>
<size=34>This giant pile looks more dangerous than lucky.</size>

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ghuuu… It is unfortunately undeniable that it has claimed its first victim……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Mmmm～ It very much pains me to concede, but given even my 
Divine Shiraoki–sent trainer opines this way, it seems I must.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I'll agree, then, to hold just the tiniest of homa rituals at the incinerator.

All was silent for a while as I helped Matikanefukukitaru 
carefully wrap up some of her lucky items and we made our 
way to the incinerator behind the academy's main building.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah, ah… How I loathe to part with these～ Few as they may be, it's still unimaginable to throw away such embodiments of fortune!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: …… Wuuuuh, Trainer. Which one do I start with…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aah! That's the charm that lead me to the quarterfinals at a ball game tournament in elementary! Do you know what you're asking!? I couldn't possibly start with this!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aaaah! When a tricycle was about to run over my foot, this doll got ran over in my stead! It's a yorishiro, I tell you! I don't want to imagine what would happen if I burned it…
choice_data_list: Fine, start with this pudding cup…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: That is the cup from the first time I broke off the tab of a Pucchin Pudding at age four! You can't ask me to burn something like thaaat～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Guguguh… I really don't wish to part with any of these after all! Please have mercy, O gods above, enlightened one, esteemed Trainer, I'll do anything you ask me of meee!

With Matikanefukukitaru rubbing her hands together as if 
praying for dear life, we decided to leave the incinerator 
behind for the moment.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
These items are all incredibly important to me… 
That said, taking them back to the dorm with me 
will eventually result in more casualties……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Do you have any good ideas, Trainer? I will entrust you 
this wit charm, so please help me think of something～!
choice_data_list: Do you want me to keep them?
Would you like me to keep them?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Keep them…! Ooh, will you?! Thank you so much! 
We'll be sharing both our fate and luck, won't we!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I have to say I'm so relieved. If I'd had to throw even a single one away, my happiness would… ah, never mind!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I did say I was relieved, but now that I'm really leaving 
them with you, I still feel anxious… Can I at least come 
to look at them once a week?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Bless your heart! I'm really fortunate to have 
such a kind soul as my fated partner!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I bid you good night then, Trainer! 
Make sure to tuck my lucky items in cozily too～!

…… Matikanefukukitaru vigorously waved a white 
handkerchief when we parted ways for the day, 
as if she'd just left behind a puppy for adoption.
